Package org.javalite.activeweb

Class FormItem

java.lang.Object
org.javalite.activeweb.FormItem
Direct Known Subclasses:
FileItem
public class FormItem extends Object
Represents an form item from a multi-part form.
Author:
Igor Polevoy
